name: Loginradius
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Social Login Add-ons Available for various CMS and e-Commerce systems

WordPress: http://loginradius.github.com/Social-Login-for-wordpress/

Joomla: http://loginradius.github.com/Social-Login-for-Joomla/

Drupal: http://loginradius.github.com/Social-Login-for-Drupal/

OsCommerce: http://loginradius.github.com/Social-Login-for-osCommerce/

Prestashop: http://loginradius.github.com/Social-Login-for-Prestashop/

### Authors and Contributors
These quick and easy Add-ons for Social Login developed by LoginRadius (http://www.LoginRadius.com). Please help us to improve it by reporting bugs and suggestions to hello@loginradius.com.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Add-ons? Check out the documentation at http://www.LoginRadius.com or contact hello@loginradius.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
tagline: LoginRadius is a Software As A Service (SAAS) which enables social login through providers such as Facebook, Twitter, Google, and 15 others, on a third party website.
